p:
Essential oils are a group of special natural substances known for biological activities such as antimicrobial, herbicidal, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory activities, and so on
21â€“ 25 . So far there is no report on the chemical constituents of O. acanthium essential oil. The objectives of the current study include: (i) determination of the chemical profile of the essential oils obtained from different plant organs of O. acanthium; (ii) evaluation of the phytotoxic activity of O. acanthium essential oils and the major components.
